data.name: Corvus Glaive
data.description: Corvus Glaive uses Stealth and Piercing to infiltrate and eliminate the Black Order's enemies.

starItems.name: Corvus Glaive
starItems.description: Corvus Glaive uses Stealth and Piercing to infiltrate and eliminate the Black Order's enemies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

This attack cannot be blocked. If Proxima Midnight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

This attack cannot be blocked. If Proxima Midnight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

This attack cannot be blocked. If Proxima Midnight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an Assist from an ally Proxima Midnight

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an Assist from an ally Proxima Midnight.

This attack cannot be blocked. If Proxima Midnight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an Assist from an ally Proxima Midnight.

This attack cannot be blocked. If Proxima Midnight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an Assist from an ally Proxima Midnight.

This attack cannot be blocked. If Proxima Midnight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing
Always gain an Assist from an ally Proxima Midnight

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. Gain an Assist from an ally Proxima Midnight.

This attack cannot be blocked. If Proxima Midnight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.

1.description: Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

2.description: Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

3.description: Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>240%</color> Piercing, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

4.description: Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>280%</color> Piercing, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

5.description: Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing
Gain an Assist from an ally Proxima Midnight

6.description:
Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>460%</color> Piercing, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain an Assist from an ally Proxima Midnight.

7.description:
Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>700%</color> Piercing, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain an Assist from an ally Proxima Midnight.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, this ability deals double damage against the primary target if they have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, this ability deals double damage against the primary target if they have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, this ability deals double damage against the primary target if they have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, this ability deals double damage against the primary target if they have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> Piercing damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, this ability deals double damage against the primary target if they have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary target
Gain an Assist from an ally Proxima Midnight

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> Piercing damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, this ability deals double damage against the primary target if they have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

Gain an Assist from an ally Proxima Midnight.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing to primary target
+<color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing to secondary targets
Clear all <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>500%</color> Piercing damage. During <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, this ability deals double damage against the primary target if they have <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>500%</color> Piercing.

Clear all <color=#fff568>Stun</color> from all <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.

Gain an Assist from an ally Proxima Midnight.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On ally Thanos Turn, if he doesn't have the <color=#fff01c>Mind Stone</color>, grant him the <color=#fff01c>Mind Stone</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. This character can only do this once per match.

When an enemy or this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> up to a max of <color=#86e619>2</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage
<color=#fff568>BLACK ORDER</color> and Thanos allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On ally Thanos Turn, if he doesn't have the <color=#fff01c>Mind Stone</color>, grant him the <color=#fff01c>Mind Stone</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. This character can only do this once per match.

When an enemy or this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> up to a max of <color=#86e619>2</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>BLACK ORDER</color> and Thanos allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On ally Thanos Turn, if he doesn't have the <color=#fff01c>Mind Stone</color>, grant him the <color=#fff01c>Mind Stone</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. This character can only do this once per match.

When an enemy or this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> up to a max of <color=#86e619>2</color>.

While in <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>BLACK ORDER</color> and Thanos allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
While in <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage
<color=#fff568>BLACK ORDER</color> and Thanos allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On ally Thanos Turn, if he doesn't have the <color=#fff01c>Mind Stone</color>, grant him the <color=#fff01c>Mind Stone</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. This character can only do this once per match.

When an enemy or this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> up to a max of <color=#86e619>2</color>.

While in <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>BLACK ORDER</color> and Thanos allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
While in <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Chance
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage
<color=#fff568>BLACK ORDER</color> and Thanos allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On ally Thanos Turn, if he doesn't have the <color=#fff01c>Mind Stone</color>, grant him the <color=#fff01c>Mind Stone</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. This character can only do this once per match.

When an enemy or this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> up to a max of <color=#86e619>2</color>.

While in <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>BLACK ORDER</color> and Thanos allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
